channel.title: Gold crown in testscape
channel.description: How i can be owner of testscape source i tried that nickname: admin thing i was admin but when i logged out my owner rights was gone. how i can no be owner of server?

item.title: Gold crown in testscape
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

go into client.java and search for this:

//start of moderator/admin list, 1 = player mod, 2 = gold mod, 3 = owner

And then it will look like this:

[code] if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“admin”))
{
playerRights = 3;
}

		else if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("nvi ible"))
		{
			playerRights = 3;
		}[/code]

Ok by chnage the “admin” or “nvi ible” to any name you want gives that name access to the special rights. The “3” 's are the rights. Here are rights as listed:

0 = normal player

1 = player moderator

2 = administrator

3 = owner

Enjoy!

~Mod Taharok

Read full topic

item.title: Gold crown in testscape

item.description:
@blackout wrote:

u go to client…nd look for the admin/mod list thingy…nd change the word “admin” to ur name…(i did that than deleted all the rest mods/admins/nd stuff…nd i worked 4 me!
